import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Col' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Container' import Image from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Image' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Row' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Card' import bigStar from '../components/star.png' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Button' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const DevicePage = () => { const [device, setDevice] = useState({info : []}) const params = useParams() useEffect(()=>{ }, []) return (

{device.name}

{device.rating}

From: {device.price} dollar

Parametries

{ device.info.map((info,i)=>
{info.title}: {info.description}
) } ) } export default DevicePage
